commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basac423eb"

diff:
"ac423eb Bug 394778: Unit tests in security/manager/ssl/tests not run. r=kengert, a=mconnor
diff --git a/security/manager/Makefile.in b/security/manager/Makefile.in
index 24f2d08..423c7d4 100644
--- a/security/manager/Makefile.in
+++ b/security/manager/Makefile.in
@@ -307,6 +307,9 @@ ifdef MOZ_XUL
 	$(MAKE) -C pki $@
 endif
 
+check::
+	$(MAKE) -C ssl $@
+
 install::
 ifndef MOZ_NATIVE_NSS
 	$(SYSINSTALL) -m 755 $(DIST)/lib/$(LOADABLE_ROOT_MODULE) $(DESTDIR)$(mozappdir)
"
